data.title: The weather in October in Russia
data.meta_description: The average weather for the month of October in Russia. Read about the average temperatures and rainfall in Russia for October.
data.text:
Normal weather for Russia in October

It's cold in October in Russia with an average temperature of 8°C. Temperatures this month range from a low of 2°C to a high of 13°C. At night, you can expect temperatures between -2°C and 6°C.

In October, there is an average of 49 mm of precipitation, spread over 18 days days. Of the total precipitation, about 3,5 cm falls as snow in October. The wind speed is around 4 Bft, mostly coming from the Southwest.

The UV index is a maximum of 3 this month. That's a moderate value on the intensity scale of 1 to 11. Unprotected skin can burn in about 30 minutes.

The highest recorded temperature on October in recent years was 21°C in 2019. The lowest daytime temperature on this day was -12°C in 2020. The extreme night temperatures ranged from a low of -21°C to a high of 13°C.

Daily Temperature in October in Russia

This chart shows the average daily high temperatures in October in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius. The bottom of the chart shows the days of October. Based on historical data, it shows the average daily temperatures for this month.

Daily Rainfall in October in Russia

This chart shows the average daily rainfall in October for Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail. The bottom of the chart shows the days of October. Based on historical data, this chart gives an idea of how much rain you can expect each day.

Daily Snowfall in October in Russia

This chart shows the average daily snowfall in October in Russia, measured in centimetres. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. The data is based on historical measurements and gives an idea of the average snowfall in October.

Daily UV Index in October in Russia

This chart shows the average daily UV index in October in Russia, with the UV index ranging from 0 to a maximum of 11. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. Based on historical data, this chart provides an idea of the daily UV radiation levels you can expect.

Temperature in October in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average temperature in October in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius, over the past years.

Total Rainfall in October in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average rainfall in October in Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail.
